27#pragma ident "%Z%%M% %I% %E% SMI"
28
29#include <sys/nvpair.h>
30#include <stdlib.h>
31
32/*ARGSUSED*/
33static void *
34nv_alloc_sys(nv_alloc_t *nva, size_t size)
35{
36 return (malloc(size));
37}
38
39/*ARGSUSED*/
40static void
41nv_free_sys(nv_alloc_t *nva, void *buf, size_t size)
42{
43 free(buf);
44}
45
46const nv_alloc_ops_t system_ops_def = {
47 NULL, /* nv_ao_init() */
48 NULL, /* nv_ao_fini() */
49 nv_alloc_sys, /* nv_ao_alloc() */
50 nv_free_sys, /* nv_ao_free() */
51 NULL /* nv_ao_reset() */
52};
53
54nv_alloc_t nv_alloc_nosleep_def = {
55 &system_ops_def,
56 NULL
57};
58
59nv_alloc_t *nv_alloc_nosleep = &nv_alloc_nosleep_def;
60
